arts.ttl: Newcastle vs Tottenham: Carabao Cup Preview, Prediction & Lineups
arts.sum: Spurs make the long trip north for Wednesday's Carabao Cup clash.

arts.ttl: Eddie Howe discusses team news for Tottenham tie
arts.sum: Yoane Wissa (knee), Lewis Hall (hamstring), and Tino Livramento (knee) are out of action, and Sven Botman came off the field with a head injury in a 2-1 win over Fulham on the weekend. So, positive signs for Tino and for Lewis and for Yoane at the minute.

arts.ttl: Pre-match analysis: Tottenham visit Newcastle in the Carabao Cup
arts.sum: Tottenham would be wise to expect Newcastle to be a threat, provided when they faced each other back in the 2024/25 season the Magpies won both encounters with a 2-1 score line home and away. Thomas Frank will be vying for a similar result tomorrow night, and reinforced in the pre-match press conference his wish for the north London club to perform in all four competitions this season.

arts.ttl: Tottenham predicted lineup vs Newcastle: Six changes from Everton win
arts.sum: Plenty of rotation is expected from Thomas Frank in midweek.

arts.ttl: Newcastle vs Tottenham predictions: Premier League pair to cancel each other out
arts.sum: Newcastle face Tottenham at St James' Park for a place in the quarter-finals of the Carabao Cup and Elliott Bretland is expecting a tight contest.
